abstract: National Labor Relations Board ruling could profoundly alter relationship between companies and their subcontractors and between franchise operators and their franchisees; business groups say decision may threaten business model of staffing agencies that provide customers with temporary workers.
lead_paragraph: Some fear the decision, which is likely to face legal challenges, could threaten the business model of staffing agencies, subcontractors and franchise operators.

headline.main: Labor Board Ruling on Joint Employers Leaves Some Companies Scratching Their Heads
headline.print_headline: Labor Ruling Could Upset Some Models of Business

snippet: Some fear the decision, which is likely to face legal challenges, could threaten the business model of staffing agencies, subcontractors and franchise operators.

keywords.value: American Federation of Labor-Congress of Industrial Organizations
keywords.name: organizations
